explanation: [0-0] The video begins with a stationary white soccer ball on a lush green lawn, the ball bearing the black Li-Ning logo.

[0-4] The camera then pans to reveal a soccer field, with buildings and fences in the background. A male cameraman wearing a black T-shirt stands in front of a black tent, facing several people who are preparing to film. A male soccer player in a Barcelona jersey receives a passed soccer ball. After receiving the ball, he juggles it alternately with his feet. There is a person on the left recording him with a mobile phone as he juggles the ball and slowly turns left.
